GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
ASoC: cros_ec_codec: Fix refcount leak in cros_ec_codec_platform_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit ca6c9244e6c9827a0b2fe8808c5e7b1ee8ab7104, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit b6bc07d4360dbf766e551f18e43c67fff6784955. For more details please see the references link.
